description: Validator for the Record Call callflow action

action.name: Action
action.description: Toggle whether to start or stop a recording

time_limit.name: Time Limit
time_limit.description: Limit, in seconds, of how long to record the call

format.name: Format
format.description: Disk Format to write the recording

url.name: URL
url.description: What URL to use as a base for where to send the recording after it finishes

record_on_answer.name: Record on Answer
record_on_answer.description: Whether to delay starting the recording until the call is answered

record_sample_rate.name: Sample Rate
record_sample_rate.description: Sampling rate of the recording, in Hz
